alert.note: Alert for Edmunds; Faulk; Hand; Hyde; Potter; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:21AM MDT until June 14 at 3:15AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Edmunds County in north central South Dakota... Northern Hand County in central South Dakota... Northeastern Sully County in central South Dakota... Hyde County in central South Dakota... Faulk County in north central South Dakota... Southeastern Potter County in north central South Dakota... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 320 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gorman to near Highmore, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Highmore around 325 AM CDT. Gettysburg around 330 AM CDT. Ree Heights around 335 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Polo, Tolstoy, Burdette and Rockham. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Edmunds; Faulk; Hand; Hyde; Potter; Sully
